::Skullgrin/Hell Drak::

Skullgrin laughed in triumph over AzureBlade.  AzureBlade's shots made him
stumble, but his tough Pretender shell held up.  Then, out of nowhere, Hell
Drak pounced!

"YOU WON'T KILL ANYMORE!  I'LL MAKE SURE YOU DIE!" Hell Drak yelled, jumping
on him and scratching at his head with her sharp claws.

Hell Drak finally pulled out a lazer gun, and put it to Skullgrin's head,
and pulled the trigger.........Skullgrin dropped to the ground, unconscious.
Hell Drak was off, and she had a limp.  She limped towards AzureBlade...
